ext_description.message: Display the vicinity of a particular tweet on Twitter.

HOUR_AFTER.message: Maximum hours after the particular tweet

DEFAULT_ACTION_ON_CLICK_EVENT.message: Default action on click (another action is performed on shift and click)

SHOW_USER_TL.message: Show User-Timeline (there are limits to the number of tweets)

TWITSPRITZ.message: TwitSpritz: show tweet like "Spritz" (mainly for Japanese sentence)
